pageProps.content:
Experience

The Boma Entebbe is set within lush tropical gardens in one of Entebbe’s best neighbourhoods.
On your doorstep you will find the city’s golf course, beautiful botanical gardens & the Uganda Wildlife Education Centre.
Its unpretentious & down-to-earth atmosphere combined with a family-friendly swimming pool & kids play area makes this a wonderful choice for families.
With a convenient location close to Entebbe International Airport, The Boma Entebbe is the ideal stop-over before or after a gorilla trekking adventure.

Stay

There are 15 luxurious rooms at The Boma Entebbe, all individually decorated to reflect the African & European influences on Uganda.
The room categories include double rooms, triple rooms & single rooms, each featuring an en-suite bathroom, WIFI & a private veranda.
The central area features a family-friendly swimming pool, restaurant with cocktail bar, craft shop, library & a children’s play area.

Activities

Activities at The Boma Entebbe include swimming, sipping cocktails at the in-house bar, playing pool or reading a book. Massages & other spa treatments can be booked at one of the nearby establishments.

subfolders.title: Lake Victoria Serena Resort
subfolders.description: Lake Victoria Serena Resort enjoys a prime location on Lake Victoria between Kampala & Entebbe, making it the idea overnight stop before or after a gorilla trekking expedition. The resort has been designed to echo a Roman villa.  With studded fountains, mosaics & manicured rose gardens, the Serena has several restaurants & bars, sporting facilities like tennis & volleyball courts, babysitting services & a fully equipped spa.

subfolders.title: Latitude 0 Degrees
subfolders.description: Latitude 0 Degrees sits among indigenous orchid-filled trees atop of Makindye Hill, boasting breathtaking views over Lake Victoria & the city of Kampala. With a convenient location only 6kms from the CBD & 45 minutes from Entebbe International Airport, Latitute 0 is the ideal stop-over before or after a gorilla trekking adventure.
